TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OSFeature extends System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport

summary.span: 提供操作系统特定功能查询。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性中提供的此类的实例来查询操作系统功能。`static` Use the `static` instance of this class provided in the property to query for operating system features. 不能创建此类的实例。You cannot create an instance of this class. 若要确定功能的版本, 请调用方法。To determine the version of a feature, call the method. 若要确定功能或特定版本是否存在, 请调用方法, 并指定要使用此类中提供的功能标识符查找的功能。To determine if a feature or a specific version is present, call the method and specify the feature to look for with the feature identifiers provided in this class. ## Examples 下面的示例使用查询操作系统以确定是否安装了该功能。The following example uses to query the operating system to determine if the feature is installed. 该示例提供了两种不同的检查方法来查看该功能是否存在。The example presents two different ways of checking to see whether the feature is present. 在第一个方法中`myVersion` , 将检查以确定它是否`null`是。In the first method, `myVersion` is checked to see if it is `null`. 如果版本为`null`, 则未安装该功能。If the version is `null`, the feature is not installed. 在第二个方法中, 该示例调用基类方法以查看是否已安装该功能。In the second method, the example calls the base class method to see if the feature is installed. 结果显示在文本框中。The results are displayed in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已创建并放置在窗体上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类无法实例化。This class cannot be instantiated. 若要查询操作系统功能, 请使用`static`此类中提供的实例。To query for operating system features, use the `static` instance of provided in this class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Feature As OSFeature
public: static property System::Windows::Forms::OSFeature ^ Feature { System::Windows::Forms::OSFeature ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 类的 实例进行功能查询。

span.span: Gets a instance of the class to use for feature queries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此`static`属性可查询操作系统功能。Use this `static` property to query for operating system features. 不能创建此类的实例。You cannot create an instance of this class. 若要确定功能的版本, 请调用方法。To determine the version of a feature, call the method. 若要确定功能或特定版本是否存在, 请调用方法, 并指定要使用此类中提供的功能标识符查找的功能。To determine if a feature or a specific version is present, call the method and specify the feature to look for with the feature identifiers provided in this class. ## Examples 下面的示例查询该功能。The following example queries for the feature. 检查版本是否为`null`, 以确定该功能是否存在。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 结果将显示在文本框中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已创建并放置在窗体上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Overrides Function GetVersionPresent (feature As Object) As Version

param.name: feature
param.span: 请求其版本的功能，为 或 。

span.span: The feature whose version is requested, either or .

summary.span: 检索当前系统上可用的指定功能的版本。

span.span: Retrieves the version of the specified feature currently available on the system.

returns.span: 表示系统上当前可用的指定操作系统功能的版本；如果找不到该功能，则为 。

span.span: A representing the version of the specified operating system feature currently available on the system; or if the feature cannot be found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性 (在此类中提供的实例)来查询功能的版本号。`static` Use the property, the `static` instance of provided in this class, to query for the version number of a feature. ## Examples 下面的示例查询该功能。The following example queries for the feature. 检查版本是否为`null`, 以确定该功能是否存在。The version is checked to see if it is `null`, to determine whether the feature is present. 结果将显示在文本框中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已创建并放置在窗体上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.GetVersionPresent Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool IsPresent(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.SystemParameter enumVal) cil managed
Public Shared Function IsPresent (enumVal As SystemParameter) As Boolean

span.span: A representing the feature to search for.

summary.span: 检索一个值，该值指示操作系统是否支持指定的功能或规格。

span.span: Retrieves a value indicating whether the operating system supports the specified feature or metric.

returns.span: 如果功能在系统中可用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the feature is available on the system; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 使用方法来确定操作系统是否支持由`enumValue`标识的特定功能或指标。Typically, you use the method to determine if the operating system supports the specific feature or metric identified by `enumValue`. 根据从返回的值, 您可以在代码中执行条件操作。Based upon the value returned from , you would perform conditional actions in your code. 例如, 如果使用的 `true`参数值调用此方法, 则可以在应用程序中以平面样式创建所有者描述的菜单。For example, if calling this method with a parameter value of returns `true`, you could create owner-drawn menus in your application in a flat style. 如果在特定操作系统版本上不可用, 则访问某些系统功能或指标可能会引发异常。Accessing some system features or metrics can raise exceptions if they are not available on a specific operating system version. 在这种情况下, 首先使用相应的枚举值和来确定是否支持此指标。In this case, first use the corresponding enumeration value, along with , to determine if the metric is supported. 例如, 在获取 属性值之前调用。For example, call with before getting the property value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法与枚举一起使用。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method with the enumeration. 该示例在调用属性之前确定操作系统是否`CaretWidth`支持该度量值。The example determines if the operating system supports the `CaretWidth` metric before calling the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent/VB/form1.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.IsPresent/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly LayeredWindows As Object

summary.span: 表示分层的、顶级窗口功能。

span.span: Represents the layered, top-level windows feature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 操作系统可以使分层窗口透明或半透明。A layered window can be made transparent or translucent by the operating system. Windows 2000 中首次引入了对分层窗口的支持。Support for layered windows was first introduced in Windows 2000. 有关详细信息, 请参阅 "分层窗口:中的平台 SDK 文档http://msdn.microsoft.com中的一种在 Windows 应用程序中使用半透明度和透明度效果的新方法。For more information, see the "Layered Windows: A New Way to Use Translucency and Transparency Effects in Windows Applications" in the Platform SDK documentation at http://msdn.microsoft.com. 若要确定是否安装了分层窗口功能, 请使用属性来调用基类方法 , 作为要查找的功能。To determine if the layered windows feature is installed, use the property to call the base class method with as the feature to look for. 或者, 你可以通过调用方法来检查是否安装了该功能, 并将作为要查找的功能。Alternatively, you can check to see if the feature is installed by calling the method with as the feature to find. ## Examples 下面的示例确定当前系统是否支持分层窗口。The following example determines whether the current system supports layered windows. 用作为要查找的功能调用基类方法。The base class method is called with as the feature to look for. 结果将显示在文本框中。The result is displayed in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已被实例化并放置在窗体上。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic OSFeature.LayeredWindows Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.LayeredWindows Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OSFeature.LayeredWindows Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.LayeredWindows Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OSFeature.LayeredWindows Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OSFeature.LayeredWindows Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Themes As Object

summary.span: 表示操作系统的主题功能。

span.span: Represents the operating system themes feature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主题是可视界面设置的集合, 其中包括在 Microsoft Plus 中首次引入的墙纸、光标、字体、声音和图标A theme is a collection of visual interface settings that include wallpaper, cursors, fonts, sounds, and icons first introduced in Microsoft Plus! 适用于 Windows 95。for Windows 95. .NET Framework 不直接支持操作主题, 尽管它确实支持命名空间中的视觉样式。The .NET Framework does not directly support manipulating themes, although it does have extensive support for visual styles in the namespace. 有关 Windows 主题的详细信息, 请参阅 Win32 SDK 中的主题和视觉样式和视觉样式参考主题。For more information about Windows Themes, see the topics Themes and Visual Styles and Visual Styles Reference in the Win32 SDK. 若要确定是否已安装主题功能, 请调用基类方法 , 将作为要查找的功能。To determine if the themes feature is installed, call the base class method with as the feature to look for. 或者, 你可以通过调用方法来检查是否安装了该功能, 并将作为要查找的功能。Alternatively, you can check to see if the feature is installed by calling the method with as the feature to find.
